content:
Sagamore Hotel Miami Beach has been an oceanfront destination for both locals and tourists alike since the Art Deco District was created in the 1940s. All forms of art are woven into the DNA of the property, which was the catalyst for the ongoing exhibit series #SagamoreisArt. Sagamore ownership, led by Ronit Neuman, offers a multicultural platform that supports and builds partnerships with local and international organizations, to promote the growth of everything art related.
